results.overview: Blonde, bouncy Buffy is your typical high school cheerleader. But all that changes when a strange man informs her she's been chosen by fate to kill vampires.
results.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer

results.original_title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer: The Animated Series
results.overview: In this un-aired pilot for the animated "Buffy the Vampire Slayer" series that was never picked up by a network, Buffy is attacked by a vampire in an alley. Later, Giles informs Buffy, Xander, and Willow that they will have to miss the party they were planning on attending because the followers of a being named Morgala are planning an apocalypse. Also, Buffy is attacked by a dragon.
results.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer: The Animated Series
